subject: Football (College)
Race and Ethnicity
Discrimination
Blacks
Segregation and Desegregation
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: On Oct. 21, 1967, teams from two historically black colleges, Jackson State and Grambling, desegregated Veterans Memorial Stadium in Jackson, Miss.
snippet: On Oct. 21, 1967, teams from two historically black colleges, Jackson State and Grambling, desegregated Veterans Memorial Stadium in Jackson, Miss.
